name: Stash
items: Took ownership of investigating a launch bug that involved AppsFlyer and concurrent threads which resulted in potential 10 second launch times. The fix I architected and implemented resulted in a ~10% increase in registrations.
Braze, Mixpanel, Apptimize, AppsFlyer, and Branch integrations.
Migrated from Branch to AppsFlyer
